lesson.title: Sally's first train ride
lesson.titleCn: 萨莉第一次乘火车旅行

sentence.text: Last week, my four-year-old daughter, Sally, was invited to a children's party.
sentence.textCn: 上周，我4岁的女儿萨莉被邀请去参加一个儿童聚会。

sentence.text: I decided to take her by train.
Sally was very excited because she had never travelled on a train before.
sentence.textCn: 萨莉非常激动，因为她从未乘过火车。

sentence.text: She sat near the window and asked questions about everything she saw.
sentence.textCn: 她靠车窗坐着，对她所看到的一切都要问个明白。

sentence.text: Suddenly, a middle-aged lady got on the train and sat opposite Sally.
sentence.textCn: 突然，一个中年妇女上了火车；坐在萨莉的对面。

sentence.text: Sally did not answer, but looked at her curiously.
sentence.textCn: 萨莉没回答，却好奇地看着她。

sentence.text: The lady was dressed in a blue coat and a large, funny hat.
sentence.textCn: 那位妇女穿着一件蓝色的大衣，戴着一顶大而滑稽的帽子。

sentence.text: After the train had left the station, the lady opened her handbag and took out her powder compact.
sentence.textCn: 火车开出车站后，那位妇女打开了手提包，拿出了粉盒。

sentence.text: She then began to make up her face.
'Why are you doing that?' Sally asked.
sentence.textCn: “你为什么要那样做呢？”萨莉问。

sentence.text: 'To make myself beautiful,' the lady answered.
sentence.textCn: “为了把自己打扮漂亮啊，”那位妇女答道。

sentence.text: She put away her compact and smiled kindly.
sentence.textCn: 她放好了粉盒，慈祥地微笑着。

sentence.text: 'But you are still ugly,' Sally said.
Sally was amused, but I was very embarrassed!
sentence.textCn: 萨莉感到很有趣，而我却很尴尬。
